body: An artificial intelligence's stat block is similar to that of an intelligent magic item. Note that these statistics reflect only the intelligence itself, not the host. Building an AI stat block requires the following statistics.
name: Creating an AI
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI

sections.body: An artificial intelligence's CR sets its ability scores, saves, and skill checks. It also sets its XP value for defeating it—this award is typically granted as a story award once the AI has been overcome, but in some cases (such as when an AI is installed in a single robot), this XP award is replaced by the standard XP for defeating that robot.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/CR
sections.name: CR

sections.body: An AI can be any alignment. Its type is "artificial intelligence," and it counts as a construct for all effects that target creature type.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Alignment and Type
sections.name: Alignment and Type

sections.body: The installed AI modifies its initiative check with its Intelligence modifier, not its Dexterity modifier.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Initiative
sections.name: Initiative

sections.body: An AI needs access to a robot, cameras, microphones, or other mechanical sensory tools in order to be able to notice things in the outside world. These senses should be listed in the appropriate encounter areas, not in the AI's stats, since it's likely that an AI will have access to a variety of sensory devices over a large area.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Senses
sections.name: Senses

sections.body: An AI doesn't have an AC, hit points, or other statistics related to a physical form; it relies on its host robot or structure for those scores. An AI uses its own saving throws only against attacks that target its mind—in most cases, this means it primarily uses its Will save. An AI uses its CR as its effective Hit Dice for determining its base saves—it has good Will saves and poor Fortitude and Reflex saves.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Defenses
sections.name: Defenses

sections.body: An AI's base ability scores are 14, 12, and 10. Arrange them in any order desired. For every 2 points of CR it possesses, it gains a +2 bonus to an ability score (assigned by the GM).
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Ability Scores
sections.name: Ability Scores

sections.body: An AI has skill points equal to 6 + its Intelligence modifier per point of CR. An AI has a number of class skills equal to its Charisma modifier. These may be any skill, though the most common class skills for AIs are: Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, Knowledge (all), Linguistics, Perception, and Sense Motive.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Skills
sections.name: Skills

sections.body: An AI has a number of feats equal to half its CR (minimum 1). An AI must meet all prerequisites of its feats. AIs also gain Technologist as a bonus feat.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Feats
sections.name: Feats

sections.body: AIs speak Androffan. An AI knows a number of additional languages equal to its Intelligence modifier.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Languages
sections.name: Languages

sections.body: Use this section to cover any unusual abilities the AI possesses.
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Creating an AI/Special Abilities
sections.name: Special Abilities
